title: help with leavebuster
body: ok, im new but i quit one time ,after when i rejoin the leavebuster say to me to type i agree to not leave anymore , BUT wen i tipe i agree its dont work help me please

replies.body: This is an unusual issue, and we'd like to take a closer look into this with you directly.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Tech team will respond back and figure out why this is happening.
